content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case involving two parties referred to as the plaintiff and the defendant the plaintiff requested the division of a rural building and two plots of land that they coowned with the defendant they argued that the property was in poor condition and needed to be divided for agricultural activities an expert was appointed by the court to assess the property and concluded that it could be divided into two lots with each party receiving exclusive ownership of certain portions the expert also recommended necessary works and adjustments the court accepted the experts divisional project dissolved the coownership and ordered the costs of the litigation and division to be shared by both parties the tribunal made a final decision ruling that the community would be dissolved and the immovable property divided the specific properties involved are described in a technical report one party will receive a portion of the property and make a financial adjustment to the other party the trial costs have been compensated and the costs of the technical report have been settled the decision was made by judge dr on april 21 2016 in bergamo

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale di Bergamo, Sentenza n. 1306/2016 del 21-04-2016
